articles.title: Precursor to suppression of labour movement
articles.content:
Precursor to suppression of labour movement

   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The "Ministers of home 
affairs, justice and labour" of South Korea released a 
"Joint statement to people" with regard to the revised 
"labour laws" on January 8, according to a radio report from 
Seoul.
   In the statement, they justified their revision of 
"Labour laws" and blared that the strike of South Korean 
workers and people from other walks of life for the 
abrogation of the laws could not be "legitimized under any 
circumstances" and that they would "Take a determined 
measure to curb the illegal strikes".
   This is a precursor indicating that the Kim Young Sam 
fascist clique, extremely upset by the daring struggle of 
South Korean workers which is daily growing in scope, will 
bring the whirlwind of frantic suppression. Accordingly, it 
cannot be tolerated under any circumstances.
   South Korean people are waging a powerful massive 
struggle for the abrogation of the evil laws in all parts of 
South Korea. Their struggle is very just and cannot be 
branded as "Illegal" in any case.
   The freedom and vital rights of people are what should 
not be violated by anyone. Moreover, the controversial 
"labour laws" secretly passed by the puppets some time ago 
are evil ones aimed at depriving workers of all their 
elementary democratic freedom and rights including the three 
rights to labour. So, they are now targets of bitter 
protests from the world public.
   This is why the South Korean workers are stubbornly 
opposing the illegal and outrageous scheme of the Kim Young 
Sam group to ruthlessly deprive them of their elementary 
rights to existence and the opposition parties join in their 
struggle.
   Since the revision of the "labour laws" was very illegal 
and outrageous, the international confederation of free 
trade unions lodged a lawsuit with the secretariat of the 
international labour organisation against the laws and the 
world press highlights articles criticising the outrageous 
act of the South Korean puppets.
   The fascist suppression will only lead to a more massive 
struggle.
   If the Kim Young Sam group crack down upon the just 
struggle of South Korean people at the point of the bayonet, 
it will result in precipitating the collapse of the 
"civilian government" of south Korea.

articles.title: Syria recognozes DPRK only
articles.content:
Syria recognozes DPRK only
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- There will be no change 
in the position of Syria recognizing only the Democratic 
People's Republic of Korea in the Korean peninsula.
   Syrian president Hafez al Assad declared this on Jan. 5 
when he received credentials from the newly-appointed DPRK 
ambassador to his country, Jong Chun Gun.
   The president said he hopes that the great leader 
comrade Kim Jong Il will enjoy a long life in good health 
and happiness and courageously brave all hardships.
   The firm relations of friendship between Syria and Korea 
will remain unchanged, he stressed.

articles.title: UNDP provides help to DPRK
articles.content:
UNDP provides help to DPRK
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The United Nations 
Development Program provided 600,000 dollars worth of 
machines to the DPRK in December last year, pursuant to an 
agreement between the DPRK government and the UNDP  on 
agricultural rehabilitation projects.
   The excavators and bulldozers that arrived in the first 
batch will be used in readjusting the flood-damaged land and 
restoring agricultural infrastructure in unpha county, North 
Hwanghae province, and other areas.
   The UNDP has already established a trust fund to raise 
38 million dollars to help restore the flood-damaged arable 
land in the DPRK and is working to draw additional donation 
from the international community.

articles.title: 3rd meeting of J-K joint investigation comm
articles.content:
3rd meeting of J-K joint investigation comm
   Tokyo, January 8 (kns-KCNA) -- The Japan-Korea Joint 
Investigation Committee had its 3rd meeting on Dec. 27 last 
year in connection with the fact that the Japanese police 
read the "Files on foreigners registration".
   An agreement was reached at the meeting upon continuing 
to urge the Japanese police authorities to investigate into 
the case, admit its injustice and make an apology.

articles.title: S. Korean fascists' tough, appeasement policy
articles.content:
S. Korean fascists' tough, appeasement policy
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today says 
the "Joint statement to the people" the Kim Young Sam group 
of South Korea published recently, totally rejecting public 
demand, boils down to appeasement, deception and blackmail.
   In a commentary the daily says:
   In the "statement" the puppets said the amended "labor 
law" is aimed at "Ensuring the coexistence and coprosperity 
of labor and management" and "Promoting the interests of all 
the people". Under the labor system in which the workers' 
vital rights are trampled down and they are ground down, 
however, it is nonsense and "labor-management cooperation" 
is unimaginable.
   Upset by massive protests, they are appeasing the people 
with a promise to take a "measure for replenishment and 
completion of the law" and "enact a special law". This 
indicates that they admit the amended "labor law" is not in 
the interests of the workers and people.
   What cannot be overlooked in the "statement" is that they 
openly revealed their intention to harshly crack down on the 
just protests of workers and other people, calling them 
"Illegal action".    
   But the South Korean workers and people will continue 
fighting to have their demand met, undaunted by the fascist 
clique's threat, suppression and appeasement.

articles.title: Papers on Kim Young Sam's "New Year press conference"
articles.content:
Papers on Kim Young Sam's "New Year press conference" 
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang-based 
newspapers today come out with signed commentaries on the 
"New year press conference" called by Kim Young Sam of South 
Korea.
   At the conference, Kim Young Sam groundlessly maligned 
and insulted the north, boasted of non-existent 
"Achievements in administration" in a bid to conceal his 
criminal nature and revealed his ulterior intention to 
strengthen his treacherous government, a news analyst of 
Rodong sinmun says, and continues:
   What Kim Young Sam has done in four years of his office 
is that he has converted South Korea into a more dependent 
colony, a more fascist theatre and a more serious graveyard 
of democracy and human rights than in the period of military 
dictatorship and a veritable hell in which the rich get 
richer and the poor poorer.
   It is none other than the traitor Kim Young Sam who has 
blocked the national reconciliation and reunification by 
setting up a political barrier between the north and the 
south and brought the situation of the country to the brink 
of war by incessantly staging war exercises against the 
north.
   At the press conference, Kim Young Sam cried that he 
would "Direct efforts to the improvement of economic system 
and to the liquidation of irregularities and corruption" for 
"This year's target of state policy aimed at change and 
reform, globalisation and economic recovery". Howerver, no 
one will believe him.
   Despite his advertisement about "economic recovery" and 
"Liquidation of irregularities and corruption", the South 
Korean economy will go to bankruptcy and irregularities and 
corruption will be prevalent in South Korea.
   We cannot but take a serious view of the fact that at the 
press conference, Kim Young Sam incited confrontation with 
the DPRK, maliciously hurling slanders at it.
   This proves that the traitor intends to escape from the 
crisis of rule and unleash a fratricidal war with the help 
of outsiders after bringing the situation to the brink of 
war by extremely aggravating the inter-Korean relations and 
coiling up the tension.
   It is only too natural that South Korean people brand the 
"New year press conference" of the traitor Kim Young Sam as 
a dirge of the master of "Chongwadae" on the verge of ruin.
   A signed commentary of Minju Joson says that the "New 
Year press conference" clearly showed that with the traitor 
kim Young Sam left in power, inter-Korean relations will not 
be improved nor can the sufferings and misfortunes of the 
South Korean people be dispelled.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
"Funeral of democracy" in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong sinmun today says 
that the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il sent thanks to 
officials and working people who had fully displayed loyalty 
to the party and the leader.
   It is reported in the paper that preparatory committees 
were formed in pakistan and benin and a photo show was 
opened in uganda, to celebrate comrade Kim Jong Il's 55th 
birthday.
   A message of thanks of the Workers' Party of Korea 
central committee was conveyed to the workers and officials 
of hwadae mine who had made signal achievements in the non-
ferrous metal ore output, says the paper.
   The press says mass rallies were held in provinces one 
after another to carry out the tasks set forth in the joint 
new year editorial, holding aloft the red flag.
   Scientists and technicians have also turned out in the 
efforts to carry out the tasks. Rodong sinmun gives accounts 
of their efforts under the headline "Scientists and 
technicians should make a great contribution to prosperity 
and development of the country".
   Papers deal with strikes of South Korean people demanding 
a total nullification of the retrogressive amendment to 
"labour laws".
   A commentary of Rodong Sinmun criticizes the traitor Kim 
Young Sam for seeking a carrot and stick policy, frightened 
at the people's struggle against the amended "labour laws".
   Given in the press is an account of a press conference 
called here thursday by South Korean defectors Paek Hung 
Ryong and his wife.
   Rodong Sinmun carries an article titled "Three mainstays, 
three charters that reflect the nation's will for 
reunification".
   Papers run commentaries branding the traitor Kim Young 
Sam's address at "The New Year press conference" as a 
funeral march of "Chongwadae" on the wane and as remarks 
full of falsity and deception.
   Minju Joson observes the 5th anniversary of the 
establishment of diplomatic relations between Korea and 
turkmenistan.

articles.title: "Funeral of democracy" in s. Korea
articles.content:
Floral baskets laid before portraits
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Robert Williams, general 
secretary of the Good Green Guyana and chairman of the 
Guyanese National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea 
of comrade Kim Il Sung, visited the DPRK embassy in 
Georgetown on New Year's Eve.
   He laid floral baskets and made respects before the 
portraits of the great leaders president Kim Il Sung and 
comrade Kim Jong Il in the name of the good green guyana and 
the guyanese national committee for the study of the juche 
idea of comrade Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Floral baskets laid before portraits
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea joint exercise
  Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. warmaniacs and 
the South Korean puppet clique held a joint intercepting 
exercise for air control in the sky above the central sector 
of the front on Thursday allegedly to cope with 
"Infiltration" from the north,  according to a radio report 
from Seoul.
   Latest-type fighters were involved in this exercise.      
They decided to strengthen the quality of the exercise and 
hold it more than once in a month in a regular way.
   These days they talk a great deal about the "Provocation 
of the north", stage various war drills one after another 
and lead the situation to an adventurous stage.

articles.title: U.S.-s. Korea joint exercise
articles.content:
Three charters of national reunification
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The three principles of 
national reunification, the proposal for founding the 
Democratic Confederal Republic of Koryo and the 10-point 
programme of the great unity of the whole nation, which were 
advanced by the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung, are three 
pillars and charters of national reunification that must 
be invariably adhered to by the Korean nation under any 
circumstances, declares Rodong sinmun in a signed article 
today.
   The three pillars and charters of national reunification 
are consistent with the idea of independence, peaceful 
reunification and great national unity, the author of the 
article says, and continues:
   The principle of independence is the starting point and 
spiritual foundation of the reunification movement of the 
Korean nation.
   Anyone who aspires after the reunification of the country 
should harbour no illusion about dependence upon the outside 
forces, the ringleader of national division, but rely upon 
the independent forces of the nation and oppose the 
interference by outsiders and take a stance and stand to 
achieve the reunification by the Korean people themselves.
   Peaceful reunification is impossible without peace.
   The confederacy formula is the only way of achieving the 
reunification by means of neither side conquering the other 
side or being conquered under the present conditions of the 
country in which different ideas and systems exist in the 
north and the south.
   If the country is to be reunified independently and 
peacefully, it is imperative to achieve the great unity of 
the whole nation.
   Our country can be reunified only when the proposal for 
founding the democratic confederal republic of koryo and the 
10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation 
are realised on the basis of the three principles of 
national reunification -- independence, peaceful 
reunification and great national unity, no matter how the 
situation may change in the future.
   The entire Korean nation is responsible for implementing 
the three pillars and charters of national reunification. 
All the fellow countrymen in the north, the south and 
overseas should make tangible contributions to promoting the 
great national unity and accelerating the country's 
reunification in a responsible manner.

articles.title: S. Koreans urge cancellation of amended "labor law"
articles.content:
Meeting  to carry out New Year tasks
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Working people in 
all provinces of Korea held meetings from January 6 to 9 
and decided to fully carry out tasks set out in the joint 
new year editorial  under the red flag.
   Reporters and speakers at the meetings called for pushing 
ahead with the forced march of socialism under the slogan 
"Let us all become victors in this year's arduous march 
!" put up in the editorial and making contribution to 
consolidating the political, economic and military positions 
of the revolution as impregnable fortresses.
   It is very important to model the whole society on the 
idea of the red flag of the Workers' Party of Korea  and 
promote economic construction, they noted, calling for 
increasing production by tapping the economic potentials in 
the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
   They also stressed the need to uphold the leadership of 
the respected general Kim Jong Il with loyalty and filial 
piety and fully carry out the behests of the great leader 
comrade Kim Il Sung so as to make the country and fatherland 
more prosperous and demonstrate the might of Korean 
socialism all over the world this year marking the third 
anniversary of the death of comrade Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Three charters of national reunification
articles.content:
Protocols on sites and service signed between DPRK and KEDO
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the 
Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) and the U.S.-
led Korean Peninsula Energy Development Organisation (KEDO) 
signed protocols on sites and service needed for the 
implementation of the agreement on the provision of light-
water reactors in New York on January 8.
   Full conditions for starting the light-water reactors 
project have been created with the signing of the last two 
protocols following the conclusion of protocols on consular 
affairs, communications and traffic on July 11 last year.
   As already reported, the united states is obliged to 
undertake the construction of two 1-million-kw light-water 
reactors in Korea till the year 2003 according to the DPRK-
U.S. Agreed framework.

articles.title: Meeting  to carry out New Year tasks
articles.content:
Japan urged to came to talks
   Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the 
Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of 
Korea issued a statement today urging the Japanese 
authorities to come out to the talks for postwar settlement 
without delay.  The statement says:
   Liquidation of the abnormal past and improvement of ties 
between the DPRK and Japan are what the peoples of the two 
countries wish and, at the same time, what the DPRK 
government has consistently called for.
   We have so far made sincere efforts to improve bilateral 
ties.
   Last year, the Japanese authorities did not sincerely 
approach the issue of improving bilateral ties by raising 
some "Preconditions."
   We have made it clear that we do not mind whether our 
relations with Japan are normalised or not.
   Our position remains unchanged.
   The point at issue, however, is that although it is more 
than 50 years since the end of the war, Japan has yet to 
atone for its military occupation of Korea and colonial 
enslavement it imposed on the Korean people during the first 
half of the century.
   For the offender to honestly apologize to the victim and 
atone for his wrongdoing is a matter of fulfilling the 
internationally recognised political and legal 
responsibility and moral obligation. It is by no means a 
matter of choice.
   With Japan failing to atone for its past, the protest of 
the fair world opinion and the anti-Japanese sentiment of 
the Korean people are on a steady increase and the hostile 
relations between the two countries go from bad to worse. 
This will, in the long run, leave indelible scars.
   While whitewashing and defending its past, Japan is 
trying to avoid atonement. This indicates that Japan is 
politically and morally vulgar and is willing to repeat the 
crime if time comes.
   With the desire to revive militarism becoming undisguised 
in Japan, the Japanese ruling party recently adopted a 
decision calling on Japan visitors to call at the Yasukuni 
Shrine. It is indicative of why Japan has avoided the 
settlement of the past.
 It is only too clear that such a country is not eligible to 
become a permanent member of the united nations security 
council. 
   Japan should fully discharge its legal and moral 
obligation, mindful that it cannot delay to the 21st century 
the atonement of the crimes it committed in the first half 
of the 20th century.
   It is also necessary for the improvement of relations 
with the DPRK. 
   We make it clear that the normalization of bilateral 
relations is impossible without Japan's settlement of the 
past.
   The Japanese authorities would be well advised to stop 
acting impudently, thinking that the establishment of 
diplomatic ties between the two countries is one side's 
"Offering" to the other.
   They must renounce the foolish thought that the passage 
of time will bury its past crimes into oblivion and come out 
to negotiations for the settlement of the past without 
delay, deeply aware that if they continue avoiding it, their 
responsibility will be heavier.
